meanings.definition: The act of sending or receiving text messages.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy our textings back and forth.
meanings.sent2: Textings have become a common way to stay in touch.
meanings.sent3: My grandma's textings are always full of emojis.
meanings.sent4: In a world of textings, handwritten letters feel special.
meanings.sent5: His textings always make me smile.

meanings.definition: Written messages sent electronically between mobile devices.
meanings.sent1: Let's have a quick look at our textings.
meanings.sent2: Her phone is full of textings from friends.
meanings.sent3: The textings on my phone are like a digital diary.
meanings.sent4: His textings are like little electronic notes.
meanings.sent5: I need to check my textings for the address.

meanings.definition: The practice of communicating through written messages on a digital platform.
meanings.sent1: Textings make it easy to chat with friends.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, she was busy with her textings.
meanings.sent3: His textings during class always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: In a world of textings, face-to-face conversations are rare.
meanings.sent5: Her textings are always full of interesting stories.
